DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: You should be used to it by now.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: I’ve come to collect the claws, do you have them?

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: I think you’ve earned your next reward.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: These are the seeds of the most beautiful flower on my land.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: With it, you can finally heal your wounds.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: But I think it might have another use...

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: But that’s for you to figure out. Good luck!
